Chiama Informer demo è la versione demo di un miglioramento ID chiamante che mostra una sovrapposizione con i dettagli di contatto aggiuntivi sulle schermate di Android in arrivo e (opzionalmente) delle chiamate in uscita.
! Proprietari di HTC Sensation!
Si prega di consultare l'informativa alla fine di questa descrizione.
NOTA: Prova questo * gratis * la versione demo per vedere se l'applicazione funziona con il telefono, se ti piace, ti preghiamo di acquistare il Informer chiamata !
Chiama Informer demo in grado di dimostrare:
★ Nome (con prefisso su Android 2.0 +)
★ Nickname * (Android 2.0 +)
Chiama Informer versione standard ha molte più funzioni:
★ Professione
★ Indirizzo e-mail / Domain
★ City, State
★ Paese
★ I Notes
★ wiele więcej

Chiamata Informer differisce da applicazioni come ID del chiamante da Whitepages e Mr. Number Caller ID. Queste applicazioni cercare le informazioni su Internet, mentre chiamata Informer mostra le informazioni che avete già salvato nei tuoi contatti. Questo significa chiamata Informer funziona su telefoni CDMA, quando le altre applicazioni non è possibile. Significa anche chiamata Informer è più limitato rispetto questi tipi di applicazioni.

Nessuna connessione a Internet è necessaria per Call Informer! Le informazioni aggiuntive vengono letti dalla tua rubrica. Chiamata Informer non tenta di trovare queste informazioni - è necessario aggiornare manualmente i contatti per i dati per visualizzare sui vostri schermi chiamata.
Caratteristiche della versione standard:
★ Mostra in una scatola solida o trasparente
★ Cambiare il colore di sfondo (wkrótce)
★ Impostare il colore del font e la dimensione
★ Opzionalmente toccare i dettagli del chiamante per aprire la scheda di contatto
★ Facoltativamente toccare per nascondere / mostrare i dettagli del chiamante
★ Riposizionare il display per soddisfare il vostro telefono (con l'anteprima)
★ Facoltativamente mostrano per le chiamate in uscita
★ progettato per essere piccolo ed efficiente
REQUISITI:

☛ necessario sottoscrivere il servizio Caller tuo gestore di cellulare ID. Senza questo, Call Informer sarà in grado di determinare chi ti sta chiamando! La maggior parte dei vettori statunitensi includono automaticamente, utenti di altri paesi dovrebbero controllare il piano di cellulare. BOTTOM LINE: Se le chiamate entrare come "UNKNOWN" invece di un numero di telefono, Call Informer NON funziona per voi (Grazie @ joey)

☛ HTC SENSE: Call Informer possono sovrapporsi vostro attuale Incoming informazioni sugli schermi di chiamata; Sto lavorando su alcune soluzioni per questo. Per ora vi consiglio di attivare l'opzione solido background, e utilizzare la preferenza di posizione verticale dello schermo per regolare il display per la migliore vestibilità. Se si disattiva toccando, è ancora possibile interagire con tutto ciò che è dietro invito Informer - è solo una sovrapposizione visiva.
TIPS:

☛ NO DISPLAY: Se non vedi Chiama Informer a tutti dopo averlo installato, accendere il telefono verso il basso e back up. Ci sono stati alcuni problemi per quanto riguarda alcuni dispositivi HTC (più spesso) che non vogliono consentire la chiamata Informer servizio per l'avvio. Il riavvio è stato segnalato per risolvere questo problema per alcuni utenti. Inoltre, provare a utilizzare la preferenza posizione dello schermo per regolare nuovamente la casella di dettagli per adattarsi ai limiti dello schermo.

☛ proprietari HTC Sensation: Call Informer è stato riportato non funziona quando lo schermo è bloccato. Sto cercando di trovare la soluzione per questo problema. Per ora, se si possiede questo telefono vi consiglio l'acquisto in attesa di chiamata Informer. Si noti che questo mio influire su altri telefoni HTC con le nuove versioni di senso pure. Grazie per la vostra pazienza!

Connect wirelessly to your Agilent handheld digital multimeter via Bluetooth® technology. View measurements from up to three Agilent handheld digital multimeters. The Agilent Mobile Meter enables you to extend your reach wirelessly to multiple points from a single location. Make measurements from a safe distance, eliminate the need to walk back-and-forth between measured points and control panel during trouble shooting.
Features:
- Select either one-, two- or three-meter mode to connect with Agilent handheld digital multimeters.
- Continuously scan measurements for remote monitoring purposes.
- Assign labels the measurements.
- Identify the connected multimeter(s) with just a press of a button.
- Remotely change the measurement modes of connected multimeters.
- Share your measurements as text or image or both via e-mail or other installed sharing apps such as Facebook, Twitter etc.
For more information, visit www.agilent.com/find/hhgowireless
System Requirements
- Any Agilent handheld digital multimeters*
- U1177A IR-Bluetooth adapter
- Any Android devices with Bluetooth connectivity**
- Android Versions: 2.2, 2.3, 3.1, 3.2 and 4.0
Notes:
*U1240 Series requires additional U1179A IR Bracket to enable connection with the U1177A Bluetooth adapter.
**Certain devices are able to connect up to two multimeters only (for eg: the Samsung Galaxy S/S2 and HTC Thunderbolt smartphones)
***Android devices’ hardware performance may impact the responsiveness of the Mobile Meter.
The following Android devices are tested and found compatible with Agilent Mobile Meter. However, the devices are not limited to the list below.
Android smartphones:
- Google Nexus One (Android 2.3)
- HTC Sensation Z710e (Android 2.3)
Android Tablets:

- Samsung Galaxy Tab GT-P1010 (Android 2.2)
- Samsung Galaxy tab 10.1 GT-P7510 (Android 3.2)
- Samsung Galaxy Tab 7 Plus, 7.7, 8.9, 10.1 (Android 3.1/3.2)
- Asus Transformer Prime (Android 4.0)
- Motorola Xoom (Android 3.2)
- Acer Iconia Tab A500 (Android 3.1)

Messe Düsseldorf GmbH presents the App with all information related to the international premium trade fairs in Düsseldorf. Perfect Smartphone integration thanks to offline search, GoogleMaps link and interactive hall map allows you to be perfectly prepared for your trade fair visit. With this exclusive App you always have all relevant details for the trade fair virtually “at hand”.
Feature Overview:
Trade Fair Selection:

Messe Düsseldorf App offers the selection between the exhibitor and product data of all current and upcoming trade shows in Düsseldorf: A+A, boot, CARAVAN SALON, COMPAMED, digi:media, drupa, EuroShop, GDS, GIFA, interpack, MEDICA, METEC, NEWCAST, ProWein, REHACARE, THERMPROCESS, TOP HAIR International Trend & Fashion Days and Valve World Expo. With this application you have mobile access to tens of thousands of exhibitors, product details and hall plans.
Interactive Site Map and Hall Layout

The interactive site and hall maps provide perfect guidance around the fair grounds. The site offers infinitely variable zoom and all information submitted by exhibitors. Zoom into the individual halls and see all stands. Just click on a stand and all exhibitor information plus the products offered will be displayed - even in the flight mode.
Favourites
Mark your desired exhibitors, products and supporting programm events as favourite and create your personal list. Messe Düsseldorf App this way closes the gap as your personalized trade fair guide.
News

With the Messe Düsseldorf App you are constantly kept up to date – making it possible for you to “mine” data related to the trade fair and its exhibitors. Exclusive news announced by the trade fair as well as the latest exhibitor innovations are just a click away. Make sure you don’t miss any news in the run-up to, during and after the trade fair.
Interactive Site Map and Hall Layout

iPhone’s optimised site and hall maps provide perfect guidance around the fair grounds. The site offers infinitely variable zoom and all information submitted by exhibitors. Zoom into the individual halls and see all stands. Just click on a stand and all exhibitor information plus the products offered will be displayed.
Information on the trade fair

All details revolving around your visit to the trade fair are presented in this area in a coherent format. Information on opening hours, admission prices, focal ranges on display, to name but a few assist you in optimally preparing your visit to the trade fair. Thanks to the comprehensive integration of calender and GoogleMaps your Smartphone will become a perfect companion guide at the fair.
Trade Fairs in Düsseldorf

Hosting 50 trade fairs at its Düsseldorf Exhibition Centre, of which 23 are global premium trade fairs in their sectors, and about 120 of its own events the Messe Düsseldorf Group is among the leading export platforms worldwide. Gain an overview of all trade fairs held at the Düsseldorf Exhibition Centre including key data on the individual events.
Messe Düsseldorf – Your Basis for Business
www.messe-duesseldorf.com

RemoSync Business Email for Phones. Sync your Mails, Contacts, Calendar, Tasks.
Note: Phone Build. Pricing 19.99USD after 2 weeks free trial.

Access your corporate and personal email on your Android mobile phone with RemoSync Business Email Client. Using Microsoft Exchange ActiveSync (EAS) protocols, RemoSync connects Android devices directly to Microsoft Exchange (2003, 2007, and 2010), Hotmail, Windows Live, Gmail, Google Apps, IBM Lotus Notes(8.5.1, and later versions), and Zimbra servers giving users real-time access to email, contacts, global address list (GAL), calendar, and tasks. No proxy servers are needed.

Multiple accounts to the maximum of three are supported. One can view universal contact list and calendar events from all the accounts combined. Now, you can have your business and personal emails, contacts, and calendars as part of the same application. Easy to view different modules using top icon based menu bar.

IT administrator can enforce mobile policies through exchange server console such as Alpha-numeric security PIN length, In-activity timeout, Number of failed attempts, Remote data Wipe, and enabling attachments. All the data files for email, contacts, calendar, and tasks are encrypted and they are part of the application’s database without having an option to copy to external drives.
Users have multiple synchronization options – Real-time direct push (default), Scheduled Sync, or Manual Sync.

Email features: Latest 100 mails are fetched for viewing, HTML viewer, attachment (word, excel, power point, PDF, etc) viewer integration with Quick Office, server folders and sub-folders, local folders (outbox, sent items, drafts, archives), compose, reply, reply all, smart forward, customized quick messages, search mail, email alerts with filters, and handling meeting invitations.

Contact features: Maximum of 2000 contacts from the default contact folder (at server) can be synchronized to the phone’s contact database, option to save the contacts to native phonebook, add and modify the contacts, search and access contacts from global address list (GAL) by entering minimum of 3 characters (Lotus Notes requires 4 characters), make voice calls or send text or MMS messages from the contact’s phone number, send email messages from the contact’s email address.

Calendar, Tasks features: saves all the calendar events from the past one month, single and recurring events, schedule appointments, add and modify the events, add and modify the tasks, task status, search events, meeting and task reminders, and off-line events.
Time zone is set to phone’s default time. Full Sync, Sync Status, and Out of Office features are supported.

Do you have PDF documents on your phone that you don't want others to see? Confidential? Want to password protect them? Then ‘PDF Lock’ is the solution!
Use the simple user interface and quickly secure your PDF documents
The first screen shows all the PDF documents you have on the SD (memory) card
You can use the PDF Lock file explorer by selecting the list icon and manually exploring the SD (memory) card to find documents to secure.
Using the file explorer you can also add, edit, delete, copy, past and move files, zip and share files
TO SECURE PDF DOCUMENTS
Long click / tap on the document you wish to protect and select 'Encrypt'
Once encrypted the icon of the document will be shown as a padlock
To view the file you must decrypt the document first by long click / tap on the document and select 'Decrypt'
Ad free!
Other features:
* Ad free
* User friendly interface
* Secure PDF documents using AES encryption
* Using file explorer add, edit, delete, copy, past and move files, zip and share files
This is a BETA release, many more features coming soon
PLEASE BACKUP YOUR DOCUMENTS TO YOUR PC BEFORE USING THIS APPLICATION

Matlab Commander allows you to use Matlab from your Android smartphone.
The minimum requirements on the PC controlled by Matlab Commander are Matlab 2007b and Java 6.
WARNING ON SECURITY AND DEVELOPMENT STAGE
Please note the following:
- this is an early release, pushed out for comments and users feedback
- Matlab Commander connection to the PC running Matlab is NOT
encrypted or protected by password
- you also need to download a server application on the PC running
Matlab; the link is provided in Matlab Commander in the "Server parameters" menu.
FEATURE
Currently Matlab Commander allows you to:
- execute many Matlab commands
- show their numeric results
- browse recent commands
- one click copy-paste of recent commands
Currently Matlab Commander doesn't allow you to:
- estabilish a secure connection to the PC
- show figures (e.g. obtained with plot, mesh, surf, etc.)
- use the help command as well as other text output commands (e.g. pwd, ls, etc.)
- use Matlab graphical tools
More details:
- although it is possible to define and use higher dimensions matrices, Matlab Commander supports showing only 3D matrices
- although not supporting the pwd command, you can change the working
directory via the cd command
- the message "No output for this command, check Matlab on PC" is not an error
- some commands will give sort of an error, even if they are not (e.g.
close all, clear, etc.)
- the "Figures" and "Variables" tabs are placeholders; they will be
functional in future releases
NEXT STEP
Soon to come:
- secure connection
- recent figures (plot, mesh, surf, etc.) gallery
- use the Android camera to take and upload images to the PC running Matlab for subsequent processing
- upload files to the PC running Matlab for subsequent processing
- support for text output commands
Connect securely to your corporate network with Cisco AnyConnect for ICS devices
This package supports Android 4.0+, but due to limitations with the Android VPN Framework, some AnyConnect features are not available. Use "Rooted AnyConnect" on rooted dev.
COMPATIBLE DEVICES:
Android 4.0 devices, with the following exceptions:
- ASUS Transformer TF-201 < 4.0.3
- Archos G9 < 4.0.5
KNOWN ISSUES:
- When reconnecting, an unwanted noise or vibration occurs. This was addressed by Google in Android 4.0.3+
- The AnyConnect icon in the notification tray is unusually large. This is a limitation with the Android VPN Framework.
- Some freezes are known to occur on the Diagnostics screen.
- If root is available, deny the 'su' requests for standard features.
LIMITATIONS:
The following features are not supported using this package:
- Filter Support
- Trusted Network Detection
- Split Exclude
- Local LAN Exception
- Secure Gateway Web Portal (inaccessible when tunneled)
APPLICATION DESCRIPTION:

AnyConnect provides reliable and easy-to-deploy encrypted network connectivity from devices by delivering persistent corporate access for users on the go. Whether providing access to business email, a virtual desktop session, or most other Android applications, AnyConnect enables business-critical application connectivity.
LICENSING AND INFRASTRUCTURE REQUIREMENTS:

AnyConnect for Android requires Cisco Adaptive Security Appliance (ASA) Boot image 8.0(4) or later. For licensing questions and evaluation licenses, please contact ac-mobile-license-request (AT) cisco.com and include a copy of "show version" from your Cisco ASA. If you already have an Essentials or Premium ASA license, you may use the automated license request tool at:
https://tools.cisco.com/SWIFT/Licensing/PrivateRegistrationServlet?FormId=717

The ASA requires an AnyConnect Mobile license (L-ASA-AC-M-55XX=), as well as either an AnyConnect Essentials (L-ASA-AC-E-55XX=) or AnyConnect Premium Clientless SSL VPN Edition (L-ASA-AC-SSL-YYYY=) license, where XX is the last two digits of your ASA model number and YYYY is the number of simultaneous users. AnyConnect Mobile and Essentials licenses are enabled per ASA, there is no per user charge for either of these licenses.
FEATURES:
- Automatically adapts its tunneling to the most efficient method based on network constraints, using TLS and DTLS
- DTLS provides an optimized network connection
- Network roaming capability allows connectivity to resume seamlessly after IP address change, loss of connectivity, or device standby
- Wide range of authentication options
- Supports certificate deployment using AnyConnect integrated SCEP and the certificate import URI handler
- Policies can be configured locally, and automatically updated from the security gateway
- Access to internal IPv4/IPv6 network resources
- Administratively controlled tunnel policy
- Localizes according to the device's language and region settings
SUPPORT:

If you are an end-user and have any issues or concerns, please contact your organization’s support department. If you are a System Administrator having difficulties configuring or utilizing the Application, please contact your designated support point of contact.
FEEDBACK:

You can provide us with feedback by sending us a log bundle by navigating to "Menu > Statistics > Troubleshoot > Send Logs" and choose "Feedback to Cisco" with a description of the issue. Please read the Known Issues section prior to sending feedback.
You can reach us on Twitter by directing a tweet to @AnyConnect, or by visiting our Facebook page at
http://www.facebook.com/anyconnect
DOCUMENTATION:
Release Notes:
http://www.cisco.com/en/US/docs/security/vpn_client/anyconnect/anyconnect25/release/notes/rn-ac2.5-android.html
User Guide:
http://www.cisco.com/en/US/docs/security/vpn_client/anyconnect/anyconnect25/android-user/guide/android-acug.html
By using this application, you agree with the end user license agreement:
http://www.cisco.com/en/US/docs/security/vpn_client/anyconnect/anyconnect30/license/end_user/clientlicense.html

Leggere e scrivere su qualsiasi database lato desktop in modalità wireless con il proprio telefono Android (Utilizzo di Wi-Fi). Variazioni sul cellulare Android in grado di sincronizzare in modalità wireless e immediatamente al database desktop. Inoltre, tutte le modifiche al database del desktop può istantaneamente in modalità wireless e inviare al telefono Android, in modo da avere sempre le informazioni più recenti a portata di mano. Avrete bisogno del nostro software Desktop. L'utente può lavorare non in linea quando la rete non è disponibile e inviare i dati quando la rete sarà disponibile. Caratteristiche: * Sincronizza qualsiasi database lato desktop in modalità wireless sul tuo cellulare Android / Tablet (Wi-Fi). * Aggiungi / Modifica / Elimina i dati sul telefono Android, che sarà immediatamente trasferimento al database sul tuo PC in modalità wireless. * Aggiorna i dati sul campo, che si riflettono a database server (database desktop). * Sincronizzare tabella / vista o stored procedure del database con il telefono Android. * Basi di dati supportati: Microsoft Access, Access 2007, Microsoft Excel, Excel 2007, Oracle, SQL Server, DB2, MySQL, PostgreSQL, FoxPro, dBase, R: base e di qualsiasi ODBC Database. * Crea il tuo database personalizzato su dispositivo Android, o scegliere tra uno dei modelli predefiniti come VehicleInfo, BankAccount, ecc MembershipInfo * I dati sono garantiti come AES a 128 bit utilizzato per la crittografia. * Supporto Unicode database lingua come giapponese, cinese, coreano, russo, ecc * Moduli supportati sul telefono Android e Tablet. * Struttura maschera sul desktop con l'etichetta, campo di testo, pulsanti, checkbox, casella combinata, pagina, immagine Firma, controllo sub-form. * Supporta moduli Sub, Progettare un form Master-Details, o un genitore / form figlio utilizzando il modulo sotto. * Invio di dati su singolo record di modulo come. Un'immagine PNG via Email. * Controllo Image in forma, immagine di selezione sul dispositivo per ogni record. * Crea una maschera in verticale / orizzontale. * Import / Export di progettazione form. * Supporta la sincronizzazione di Image / Firma con il database del desktop. Software ha 10 giorni di valutazione periodo. Scaricare e installare componente desktop di questo software su Windows basato su PC dal link seguente.
http://www.cellica.com/download/CellicaDatabaseAndroidWiFi.exe
Guida per l'utente: Acquisto
http://www.cellica.com/AndroidCellicaDatabaseWiFiUserGuide.pdf

la versione completa del software dal seguente link. Http://www.cellica.com/cellicadatabaseandroidWiFi.html differenza tra la versione Internet e la versione Wi-Fi: in seguito sono le caratteristiche aggiuntive di questa versione Wi-Fi. 1. Supporta la firma di controllo. 2. Supportare la sincronizzazione delle immagini con il database desktop. 3. Immediata la sincronizzazione dei dati in entrambe le direzioni. 4. Non c'è bisogno di Internet sul dispositivo. versione di Internet permette di sincronizzare i dati da ogni dove. versione Wi-Fi supporta la sincronizzazione di dati solo in area locale Wi-Fi. Nota: Se si utilizza un firewall sul computer, si prega di aggiungere la porta in Firewall dal seguente percorso. Pannello di Controllo -> Windows Firewall ->Eccezioni (scheda)->Qui uso "Aggiungi porta" pulsante, riceverete il messaggio "Aggiungere una porta finestra di dialogo. Aggiungi qualunque sia il nome che volete dare queste informazioni porta nel campo "Nome" testo e aggiungere "8585" nella casella "Numero di porta" del testo. (Se si cambia in porta lato desktop Cellica Database delle preferenze, aggiungere che porta il cambiamento qui). Si prega di confermare che "TCP" è selezionata. Ora cliccate su Ok, pulsante e provare a utilizzare il software. Si prega di confermare di avere lo stesso IP utilizzati in applicazione del dispositivo lato che è indicato nella applicazione desktop lato Cellica Database.

E’ un’APP pensata e realizzata per i tecnici e gli operatori di settore che utilizzano distributori automatici di N&W Global Vending SpA (per Brand:Necta, Wittenborg, SGL). L’accesso è riservato agli utenti registrati ed abilitati dalla casa madre.
Il software permette di:
. ricercare prodotti attraverso discesa gerarchica e/o filtri di ricerca
. visualizzare prodotti attraverso disegni esplosi
. identificare pezzi di ricambio
. verificare la disponibilità dei pezzi
. visualizzare i prezzi dei prodotti con listini diversificati per utente e area geografica
. costruire una lista di ricambi (carrello) ed inviare l’ordine
. consultare la documentazione tecnica associata ai prodotti
. scaricare documenti all’interno del telefono (Libreria off-line)
. accedere alla documentazione specifica di prodotto attraverso la lettura del QRCode posto sull’etichetta del prodotto
Per visualizzare i documenti in formato PDF è necessario avere installato sul dispositivo un apposito lettore (ad es. Acrobat Reader)
Per gestire un QRCode è necessario avere installato sul dispositivo un apposito lettore (ad es. Barcode Scanner)

VMobile is a mobile video surveillance application provided by QNAP for remote and wireless monitoring of IP cameras and video playback by connecting to VioStor NVR through your Android phone (v1.6, v2.1, and v.2.2). As long as you have network access, you can connect to and manage your video surveillance system anytime, anywhere.

VMobile supports monitoring of unlimited servers/channels from hundreds of network cameras of different brands by simple connecting to any available VioStor NVR on the network. The application supports advanced monitoring features, such as adjustable display mode, PTZ and preset position control, instant notification of alarm events, and snapshot. You can also playback the recording data from different monitoring channels and by different alarm events.
VMobile can be installed on Android phone, and must be used with a VioStor NVR server running V3.5.0 management software or above.
Supported Android OS: 1.6, 2.1 and 2.2
Let’s Print Droid (LPD) is print enabling software for Android phones and Tablets.
Home InkJet users and USB printer users please read the InkJet help file detailing printing options including using Google Cloud Print.
- It is designed to work on devices using Android 2.2 or greater.
- It is designed mainly to print to network connected printers.
- Files on your device can be printed directly from the LPD file chooser dialog or you may use the Share or Send function of another Android app to print via LPD.
-LPD now supports Google Cloud Print. Just choose Cloud Print from the Protocol option list in the Add Printer dialog box.
- LPD can print PDFs, Jpeg, PNG images, Text Documents and static web pages.
- It does not need a “printer driver”.
- It can enable Android users visiting your location to print with minimal configuration by the user. Load the app, scan a QR code; the document prints.
- LPD can also perform simple File Transfers using FTP(S), HTTP(S) or SMB/CIFS. Transfers are performed similarly to printing and appear as options in the Protocol pull-down in Add Printer screen.
- It enables corporate “cloud printing” when teamed with server software such as Enterprise Output Manager by Unisys, Microsoft Server or Linux/Unix.
- A detailed free-ware work around for all types of printers (including USB connected) is provided in the help files.
Get instant support for your HP business printers, laptops, desktops, workstations and servers.
Quickly resolve your issue or find answers using:
• - 24x7 chat support with HP Support Specialists (Service in English available Worldwide on supported products)
• - View recommended solutions and technical manuals specific to your product
• - Check warranty and active contract status for your products
• - Enhanced phone support via priority call routing for North American customers.
For more information, visit
http://www.hp.com/services/hpscmobile

The Electric Service Calculator (Calculator) is a convenient tool to determine the minimum electrical load demand for one-family dwellings based on the Standard Calculation Method as defined by Article 220 of the 2011 National Electrical Code (NEC®). Electricians from other countries are welcome to use the Calculator as well. It is your responsibility to insure that your community implements the NEC for the United States.

The Calculator determines grounded and ungrounded loads for general lighting, fastened (or fixed) appliances, dryers, cooking appliances, heating and A/C units, and the largest motor. All numeric entries are in Volt-Amperes (VA). The calculated loads are compiled to determine the total service load for a single-family dwelling.

After the service load is calculated the Calculator determines the size of the service-entrance conductors required for the dwelling. Proper sizing of the conductors is required to ensure the safety and efficiency of the service.
The Calculator is designed to be an aid to electricians in electrical load calculations and is not intended to replace Article 220 of the NEC® or the NEC® as a whole.
National Electrical Code and NEC are registered trademarks of the National Fire Protection Association, Inc.
On our support forum located at
http://bendele.net/forum/
you can:
- ask questions about how the Calculator calculates.
- offer suggestions for improving the application.
- report defects (bugs).
- request new features.
Thank you very much for using the Electric Service Calculator . We hope that it saves you time and money.

PC completo virtuale con Chrome, Java, Firefox, OpenOffice, Dropbox e altro ...
Immaginate di avere un computer nel vostro Android, con una suite Office completa, funzionalità di copia e incolla e un browser di classe PC. Oggi è possibile!

AlwaysOnPC-HD Edition per Tablets Android con schermo più grande (>960x720) è il vostro "PC virtuale" personale su cui eseguire i browser FireFox o Chrome con FLASH e JAVA (full-motion e audio non sono ancora disponibili), una SUITE di OFFICE completa, DROPBOX integrato e molto altro direttamente sull Android.

AlwaysOnPC offre un computer virtuale completo precaricato con oltre 40 applicazioni, accessibile ed utilizzabile da qualsiasi smartphone Android. Seguono solo alcune delle funzionalità disponibili con AlwaysOnPC:
✔ Suite Office completa: per aprire, modificare, tagliare/copiare e salvare documenti in Word, Excel e Powerpoint.
✔ Browser Google Chrome OPPURE Firefox, con Flash, componenti aggiuntivi, barre degli strumenti, sincronizzazione.
✔ Accesso a Dropbox, Google Docs e altri storage on-line.
✔ 2 GB di storage on-line. È facile caricare i file dal computer....
Lasciate il laptop a casa
✔ Apertura e salvataggio dei file su WiFi o 3G incredibilmente veloce: fino a 5 volte più veloce rispetto alle applicazioni della concorrenza.
✔ Sicurezza estremamente solida: tutte le connessioni con AlwaysOnPC sono crittografate per rispettare privacy e sicurezza.

✔ Possibilità di esplorare tutto il Web: da Facebook o i giochi Java come Runescape alle applicazioni Java, ai siti o all'analitica di Google, funziona a meraviglia! (Audio e video in streaming saranno disponibili a breve…).
✔ Effettivo multi-tasking: tagliare/copiare e incollare fra applicazioni disegni e foto, aprire e modificare allegati di e-mail, salvarli, riallegarli per rispondere/inoltrare.
✔ Ancora più applicazioni: tutto, da programmi di disegno e modifica di immagini simili a Photoshop, ai pluripremiati scacchi GNU…

The classic and interesting game --- Bubble Shooter !!
最专业,最好玩,最益智的游戏趣味数独全新上线!共3500关卡,6种模式,无尽的挑战!
6种模式：标准数独,x-数独,%-数独,弯曲数独,弯曲x-数独,弯曲%-数独
每种模式都包含（简单,中等,困难）,每次难度完成20关,即可解锁下一难度.
每过一关,可获得一定的积分奖励.积分可用于游戏求助,您有三种求助方式：
1.检查当前已输入数字是否正确
2.点击单元格或随机填充一个正确数字
3.自动标注所有的未完成单元格
数独背景介绍：
九宫数独,是一种源自18世纪末的瑞士,后在美国发展,并在日本得以发扬光大的数字谜题.数独盘面是个九宫,每一宫又分为九个小格.在这八十一格中给出一定的已知数字和解题条件,利用逻辑和推理,在其他的空格上填入1-9的数字.使1-9每个数字在每一行,每一列和每一宫中都只出现一次.这种游戏全面考验做题者观察能力和推理能力,虽然玩法简单,但数字排列方式却千变万化,所以数独被认为是训练头脑的绝佳方式.
修改横屏问题
修复在部分机型上崩溃问题
更强大的游戏关卡编排
更好的用户界面及操作游戏体验
注：2.0版本将不兼容之前版本已玩过的游戏记录,并且与之前版本相比有重大改变,若您已习惯2.0之前版本的操作和游戏,请勿更新!

Important Notice: This solution is only available to Vodafone Business customers.
The Vodafone Secure Device Manager application will not operate without the required back-end Vodafone Secure Device Manager console.

Vodafone Secure Device Manager is a device management solution that lets you secure, monitor, manage and support your entire fleet of smartphones including Android 2.2 or later devices. The Android agent will only work in conjunction with the Vodafone Secure Device Manager console.

This business solution provides your IT department with a single, integrated view of all mobile devices across the organisation, allowing you to increase help desk efficiency, reduce support costs and improve the overall support experience.
Vodafone Secure Device Manager is a web-based solution, providing flexible deployment options to meet different customer IT environments. The back-end server is available as:
• Cloud Based (Software-as-a-Service)
• On-Premise Installation
Vodafone Secure Device Manager provides the following functionality:
• Centralised Over-the-Air Deployments
• Deployment of Business Applications
• Asset Management of all Android 2.2+ devices
• Over-the-Air Enrolments
• Over-the-Air Configurations Management
• Device Security and Policy Enforcement
• Remote Lock & Wipe
• GPS Tracking and Mapping
• Device Grouping and Multi Device Management
• Intelligent Notification and Reporting
Instructions for agent activation:
1) Download and install the Vodafone Secure Device Manager Android agent on your device through Google play (formerly Android Market).
2) Once you have installed the agent onto your device, activate the agent with the server URL, activation code and user credentials as provided by your company IT Administrator.
3) Once completed, your IT Manager can remotely configure your device ensuring it complies with your organisation’s business policies.

If you need assistance or are experiencing problems with the Vodafone Secure Device Manager Android agent or the general Vodafone Secure Device Manager service, please contact your local organisation’s IT support team.

Versione dimostrativa dell'app «Bollettazione Interventi». Potete scaricare la versione full a questo indirizzo:
https://market.android.com/details?id=em.software.bollettazione

Un taglio ai costi di tipografia! Questa app permette di registrare e gestire le vostre bollette di intervento, qualsiasi sia il vostro ambito lavorativo, dandovi la possibilità di esportarle per essere integrate con il vostro gestionale, nonché di inviarle in tempo reale agli indirizzi di posta della vostra amministrazione. Un pratico strumento per storicizzare al meglio le vostre prestazioni, e dire addio ai costi delle consuete bollette cartacee.
FUNZIONALITA'
Possibilità di definire un ambito operativo, specificando tecnico utilizzatore e parametri di gestione bollette.
Possibilità di registrare firma accettazione cliente, apponibile direttamente sul vostro device.
Storicizzazione delle bollette di intervento, possibilità di esportazione CSV, filtro ricerca bollette.
Possibilità di invio bollette contestuale alla loro emissione: nel caso si sia selezionato un cliente dalla propria rubrica, sarà possibile inviare copia bolletta al suo indirizzo email.
ALCUNI CHIARIMENTI SUL PROGRAMMA

Questa app è pensata per velocizzare ed economizzare il lavoro di bollettazione di interventi tecnici, abolendo gli scomodi tagliandi cartacei per favorire una maggiore interazione con gli strumenti tecnologici odierni. Il tecnico potrà caricare i dati relativi ai suoi interventi direttamente da smartphone o tablet, e - oltre a salvarli sul dispositivo - inviarli immediatamente via posta in sede, ed al cliente in questione. Le bollette caricate vengono salvate in formato PNG, per essere più facilmente esportabili su sistemi diversi.

Il programma creerà sulla vostra sdcard una cartella di nome "bollette", nella quale verranno gestiti i files prodotti, raggruppati in sottocartelle divise per anno. Su ciascuna bolletta verrà apposto un logo, che è possibile personalizzare semplicemente sostituendo il file "logo.png" nella cartella "bollette" con quello della Vs. azienda.

Premendo il tasto menù sulla videata principale dell'app, potrete accedere alle videate di configurazione (indispensabile per personalizzare l'utilizzo del programma), nonché alla lista bollette caricate, dalla quale potrete lanciare un'esportazione in formato CSV del lavoro svolto (verrà creato il file bollette.txt in accodamento, nella cartella "bollette" sulla scheda esterna), in modo da permettere un'acquisizione a mezzo Vs. gestionale.
Un taglio ai costi di tipografia, ma anche uno strumento per rendere maggiormente flessibile e più versatile il lavoro di ogni giorno.

NOTE: Dalla versione 1.5, è possibile decodificare il cliente sia da rubrica del device, che da tracciato importato da gestionale. Le due funzionalità sono accessibili tramite i bottoni immediatamente sotto alla descrizione cliente. Nel caso dei clienti da gestionale, per poterli importare è sufficiente premere il tasto "Menù" sulla schermata di lista clienti, quindi "Importa": se nella cartella "bollette" della sdcard sarà presente il file "clienti.txt", il programma procederà alla loro acquisizione. In questo caso, il tracciato è composto dai seguenti campi:
Codice;"Ragione_sociale";"E-Mail";"Indirizzo";"Località";"Provincia";"CAP";"Annotazioni"

Questa applicazione è costituito da un calcolatore Gross Profit, Calcolatore dei prezzi, Calcolatrice margine operativo, efficace Calculator Tasso di Interesse, Value Added Tax Calculator e Break-Even Point Calculator.

Calculator Utile lordo: Siete in grado di calcolare il profitto lordo (valore assoluto e percentuale) e di markup (valore assoluto e percentuale). Basta inserire il prezzo di costo e prezzo di vendita del prodotto.
Calcolatore dei prezzi: Sei in grado di calcolare il prezzo e markup. Basta inserire il costo e margine lordo.
Margine operativo Calculator: Siete in grado di calcolare il margine operativo. Basta inserire il reddito operativo e ricavi.
Efficace Calculator Tasso di Interesse: Siete in grado di calcolare il tasso di interesse effettivo. Basta inserire il tasso di interesse nominale e il numero di periodi di capitalizzazione per anno.
Imposta sul valore aggiunto: Sei in grado di calcolare l'IVA (imposta sul valore aggiunto) e il prezzo incl. IVA. Basta inserire il prezzo senza IVA e l'aliquota IVA del vostro paese.
Break-Even Point: Siete in grado di calcolare il break-even point. Basta inserire il costo fisso, costo variabile e il prezzo di una unità.

IBM® Connections is social software for business. It enables you to build a network of colleagues and subject matter experts, and then leverage that network to further your business goals. With its integrated suite of tools, you can share and discuss ideas, work collaboratively on presentations or proposals, plan and track project tasks, and much more. IBM Connections is a web application that is deployed on a company intranet to promote collaboration within the company. The IBM Connections mobile application extends access to company data to employees who are on the go.

Use the mobile application to perform common IBM Connections tasks with a minimal number of steps. If IBM Connections is deployed in your company, you can download this application and log in using the same credentials as always. (The server must be running version 3.0.1 plus the July 2011 mobile update or higher and the mobile application must be installed on it. Check with your IT administrator if you aren't sure.) If you do not have IBM Connections deployed in your company, but want to try it out, log into a deployment hosted on Lotus Greenhouse, which is an IBM product trial site. Just register with Lotus Greenhouse to create a user name and password. Download the application, and when prompted for the Connections server URL to connect to, specify
https://greenhouse.lotus.com/mobile
. Use the credentials that were created when you registered to log in.
IBM Connections 3.0.1 enables organizations to tackle daily work challenges by providing the most complete set of social capabilities for enterprises in the market today. These capabilities include:

- Profiles lets you find people that you need. It not only represents a directory of the people in your organization, but also exposes valuable information that can be used to form and encourage social networks.

- Communities brings together people with common interests. Communities help people who share common interests to collaborate easily by exchanging and sharing information and interacting with one another.

- Forums provides a place to brainstorm and collect feedback on topics that are relevant to you and your colleagues. Statements and comments are collected in a format that allows for the exchange of ideas and displays them as an ongoing conversation.
- Files provides an individual with a fast and easy way to share their content with others by uploading presentations, documents, videos, or any type of file into their own file-sharing library.
- Wikis is a great way to enable multiple users to collaboratively author web content in an easy-to-use environment. On the mobile device, users will have the ability to view their Wiki content.
- Blogs is a corporate blogging system in which individuals can share their unique perspectives and expertise, solicit feedback, and share information.
- Bookmarks lets you save, organize, maintain, and store bookmarks in a central location, allowing you to access your bookmarks from multiple computers or mobile devices.
- Activities enables an individual to easily define a set of tasks for the purpose of communicating and collaborating with others to achieve a common goal.

- Home page is a unique capability that is designed to bring all the other capabilities together in a single aggregated view. The Home page provides a view of updates and notifications from across your network. For instance, updates could be from people in your network or people you want to watch, or from tags you have identified that are of interest to you.
For more information about IBM Connections, go to the official product web site: www.ibm.com/software/lotus/products/connections/
For details about IBM Connections on Lotus Greenhouse, go to:
https://greenhouse.lotus.com/wpsgh/wcm/
connect/lotus+greenhouse/lotus+greenhouse+next+site/home/products/ibm+lotus+connections.

The app works in online or offline mode and it does not require any middleware or additional server - just install it on your device, connect directly to your Dynamics CRM and use it with your real data. You can access/create/delete/modify all data.

This app rapidly boosts the productivity of sales people and field service technicians. Now they can create new orders or quotes, access all invoices, accounts and contacts, schedule the appointments, view their dashboards and many others.
Features

• Signatures support

• Iframe support
• Multilanguage support
• Phone Integration (track your phone calls)
• Advanced filters and sorting

Professional integration of handwritten signatures in electronic documents
SignDoc Mobile
TAKING SIGNATURES SERIOUSLY
Business App for professional integration of handwritten signatures in electronic documents.
Designed primarily for quick and seamless integration in enterprise applications (apps or web portals)

Client of a signature platform independent of an operation system or particular hardware. Hence easy integration option of other (eventually already existing) signature capturing devices like Android tablets, signature pads or some smartphones.
APPROVED APP
Secure and self-explaining usage confirmed by TÜV Saarland (part of the German Technical Inspection Association Group).
REFERENCES
Read in customer reports how SignDoc Mobile became an integral part of various corporate apps –
http://sp-l.de/wQll
and
http://sp-l.de/EuMD
REASONS FOR SIGNDOC MOBILE

When signing on screen digital ink is displayed without delay and accurately - comparable to signing on paper. The first impression has an emotional aspect. Those who invest in an app with an excellent signature display are also recognized as those honoring the signature ceremony.
Choose SignDoc Mobile if you intent taking signatures seriously and hence want to …
• capture signatures with characteristics allowing a reliable authentication of a signer of a document
• create signed documents which anyone can check if their integrity is still valid
• keep electronic forms and sensitive data within the secure IT environment of your own organization

SignDoc Mobile fulfills all these requirements. It allows you to capture signatures including the biometric signals of time and location. Some tablets even provide information on pressure levels – details see
http://sp-l.de/W0n4
. Biometric signature data are stored compliant to ISO/IEC 19794-7 standard.
PDF-documents are sealed with a digital signature compliant to PDF standard ISO 32000 (“Adobe DigSig”). Signed documents may be validated with most PDF readers (incl. Adobe Reader)
FEATURES
Use this SignDoc Mobile App similar to its use in enterprise networks where the signature platform SignDoc Web (
http://sp-l.de/vJTi
) is installed.
Familiarize with the features by watching a short introduction video
http://sp-l.de/Bcvq
Especially for users of this app a secure web server was set up so that you can E-Sign with this app on your tablet PDF files for free
• with your handwritten signature and/or
• by creating an image of the signer using the built-in camera and/or
• by taking a photo of an ID document
– depending on the requirements of your process.
Sign Sample File
Select examples of typical use cases of SignDoc Mobile. The PDF form templates are prepared with fields for text and signature capturing.
Sign own documents

Choosing “SignDoc Mobile” in the “Complete action using” dialogue triggers the upload of your documents on our server. Position signature fields in the file and sign them afterwards. You may send signed documents via E-Mail, store them on your device or in a cloud service (e.g. Dropbox).
CONFIGURATION

The configuration used by the app demonstrates a standard user interface for e-Signing electronic documents. A more tailored user experience can be set up by deploying an individual SignDoc Web server as a company server which is private to an organization.

What permissions are used for:

MODIFY/DELETE USB STORAGE CONTENTS MODIFY/DELETE SD CARD CONTENTS: Saving scans on the SD card.
VIEW WI-FI STATE/VIEW NETWORK STATE: Checking for an Internet connection before attempting to upload images to a web service.
Calcolo lattoneria free
Lo scopo di questo programma è semplificare il calcolo dei costi della lattoneria. Normalmente i materiali vengono venduti a peso.
Ad esempio per i canali di gronda di un abitazione inserire i metri totali di canale, il materiale del canale, lo spessore, e lo sviluppo, quindi il costo al chilo del materiale.
Il programma restituirà il peso totale dei metri da installare e il costo presunto di acquisto.

Il programma prevede la possibilità di settare i prezzi delle materie prime al Kg. e i prezzi della componentistica per il montaggio (Supporti, Tiranti, Bocchette, Angoli)per ogni tipo di materiale scelto (lamiera zincata,acciaio inox, rame, alluminio, Rehinzink...
Inoltre è possibile settare il ricarico in percentuale da applicare sui materiali di vendita, separatamente per ogni tipo di materiale.
Inserendo nei settaggi il prezzo al metro per la posa in opera il programma calcolerà il preventivo finale.
Nei settaggi degli accessori, specificando la distanza che intercorre fra i travetti del tetto verrà suggerito inserendo i metri dei canali da posare il numero di supporti o tiranti occorenti.

The HP iLO Mobile application provides access to the remote console of your HP ProLiant server from your Android device. The mobile app interacts directly with the iLO processor on HP ProLiant servers, providing total control of the server at all times as long as the server is plugged in. For example, you can access the server when it is in a healthy state, or when it is powered off with a blank hard drive. As an IT administrator, you can troubleshoot problems and perform software deployments from almost anywhere.
The HP iLO Mobile app allows you to perform the following tasks:
- Operate the server power switch.
- Use the Remote Console to interact with the operating system, including BIOS and ROM configuration changes.
- Mount an ISO CD/DVD image. The disk image is available on the server as a USB CD/DVD drive. You can boot from the disk image and deploy an operating system.
- Launch HP iLO scripts and monitor their progress.
- Access the HP iLO web interface.
- Store the list of servers you want to manage.
Limitations:
- HP ProLiant servers with HP iLO 3 or later are supported.
- You must have network access to the iLOs you want to manage.
- You can connect through a firewall using a VPN or you can open/forward the following ports:
HTTP: Port 80
HTTPS: Port 443
Remote Console: Port 17990
- The following features require an HP iLO Advanced license on the server:
iLO Virtual Media
Remote Console is included on ProLiant Blade servers. A license is required on all other servers.
Scripting is available on all servers, but a license is required for the scripting of certain features such as iLO Virtual Media.
For information about HP iLO and HP iLO Advanced, see
http://www.hp.com/go/compareilo

- The HP iLO Mobile app can consume significant network bandwidth. When using the cellular network, monitor your data use if you do not have an unlimited data plan. Consider using Wi-Fi when possible.
- Does not currently support physical or third party keyboards.
- Does not support iLO 2 systems.
Tips:
- When viewing remote console, pinch to zoom, press to click and drag, and long-press for right-click.
- Tap the CD icon to mount/unmount a virtual media URL
- Tap the power icon to power on/off/reset the host server
- Tap the health icon to show the iLO web UI.

Business Manager è un software CRM per organizzare le opportunità di lavoro e le relazioni con il cliente.
Prova il CRM Business Manager per 3 giorni.
Sales force / Forza vendite / Lavoro opportunità / Gestione lavoro / CRM
Organizza le tue opportunità di business con il CRM.
Seleziona il tuo cliente dalla tua lista di contatti.

Ad ogni opportunità nel CMR puoi assegnare un target di fatturato e un indicatore di avanzamento della trattativa di lavoro. Di recente è stato aggiunto anche l'indicatore della probabilità di successo, fondamentale per capire l'andamento della trattativa.
Guarda il riepilogo delle opportunità per singolo contatto o totale.
Il programma di CRM si articola in 3 schede. Opportunità CRM funziona come una "to do list": Premere il tasto opzione per inserire una nuova opportunità nel CRM.
Selezionare il cliente dalla lista dei contatti.

Se il tuo contatto è un contatto di facebook prima di poterlo vedere devi associarlo ad un nuovo contatto della tua rubrica. I contatti di facebook non sono direttamente gestibili da Business Manager.
I contatti provenienti da Skype funzionano direttamente senza doverli connettere.
Sulla parte superiore dello schermo vedrete la foto del contatto, il nome e la società.
Impostare il nome e la descrizione delle opportunità.
Ci sono 4 date : data di creazione, modifica la data, vicino la data e data di scadenza.
Stato della opportunità: aperta o chiusa.
Ricavo potenziale.
Stato di avanzamento.
Clicca sul una voce dell'elenco opportunità per aprire il menu contestuale. Aprire, chiudere, eliminare e modificare opportunità.

Sintesi CRM: Nella cartella sintesi è possibile visualizzare un riepilogo delle opportunità si possono trovare nel CRM raggruppate per contatti. Usare questo come gestore dei contatti per avere accesso diretto al cliente business. Quindi, è possibile chiamare e vedere tutte le informazioni relative al contatto.
CRM Tot.: Il ricavo totale di tutte le opportunità.

RemoSync Hotmail Live Google Apps for tablets
Note: Pricing 9.99USD after 2 weeks free trial.

Access your personal and business email on your Android tablets with RemoSync Hotmail Google Apps Client. Using Microsoft Exchange ActiveSync (EAS) protocols, RemoSync connects Android devices directly to Hotmail, Windows Live, Gmail, or Google Apps servers giving users real-time access to email, contacts, calendar, and tasks. No proxy servers are needed.

Multiple accounts to the maximum of three are supported. One can view universal contact list and calendar events from all the accounts combined. Now, you can have your business and personal emails, contacts, and calendars as part of the same application. Easy to view different modules using top icon based menu bar.

IT administrator can enforce mobile policies through exchange server console such as Alpha-numeric security PIN length, In-activity timeout, Number of failed attempts, Remote data Wipe, and enabling attachments. All the data files for email, contacts, calendar, and tasks are encrypted and they are part of the application’s database without having an option to copy to external drives.
Users have multiple synchronization options – Real-time direct push (default), Scheduled Sync, or Manual Sync.

Email features: Latest 100 mails are fetched for viewing, HTML viewer, attachment (word, excel, power point, PDF, etc) viewer integration with Quick Office, server folders and sub-folders, local folders (outbox, sent items, drafts, archives), compose, reply, reply all, smart forward, customized quick messages, search mail, email alerts with filters, and handling meeting invitations.

Contact features: Maximum of 2000 contacts from the default contact folder (at server) can be synchronized to the phone’s contact database, option to save the contacts to native phonebook, add and modify the contacts, search and access contacts from global address list (GAL) by entering minimum of 3 characters (Lotus Notes requires 4 characters), make voice calls or send text or MMS messages from the contact’s phone number, send email messages from the contact’s email address.

Calendar, Tasks features: saves all the calendar events from the past one month, single and recurring events, schedule appointments, add and modify the events, add and modify the tasks, task status, search events, meeting and task reminders, and off-line events.
Time zone is set to phone’s default time. Full Sync, Sync Status, and Out of Office features are supported.

Active Directory Users and Computers for Android - Free
ActiveDir Manager is a network admin tool for windows active directory user and computer management.
Similar to Active Directory Users and Computers (ADUC).
Admin windows network user accounts and computers from any android phone or tablet (wifi, vpn or other network connection).
Main Features:
-Set user Passwords
-Undo Password Lockouts
-Enable or Disable users
-Edit User attributes (address, phone #, misc contact attribs)
-Adjust Group Membership (members and memberOf)
-Use computer objects to remote control domain computers (RDP/VNC apps supported; see additional info)
-Directory Search for User/Group/Computer
-Explorer "Tree Style" view
-Move, Delete and Undelete Objects (tombstone objects)
-Simple find only Locked users
-Supports TLS, SSL, or non-encrypted sessions
-Supports all current AD versions and functional modes
-Save connection settings for multiple directories.
-Unlimited directory size (result size adjustable)
-No server software required; utilizes Native Active Directory LDAP provider.
-Standard Wifi or VPN network access, no abnormal firewall configurations.

The free version of this application has limitations for a reason, if aomething doesnt work, please contact me. If you leave a silly comment about it being a sample, that is exactly what it is. If the app fail, by all means leave negative feedback, but I will work with folks to establish that it does work. Please respect the means I use to provide a fully functional free app, with a very lax limitation for it being free. If you appreciate the app, I encourage you to purchase, and am open to refund if there are complications.
*Free version does not save connection definitions or settings long term(forgetful free version). Full version is availiable here: https://market.android.com/details?id=net.bealsystems.ADUserManager
*If you experience problems, please email me using the contact form
http://www.activedir.mobi/?page_id=15
This is a Windows Admin tool, intended for use by network administrators and various IT professionals. Valid credentials are required to connect to a windows domain.

ActiveDir connects to any Windows Server Active Directory via an LDAP connection. No additional software is required; however Active Directory Services does require a basic certificate configuration to enable encryption (req'd to set passwords). This is typical started by adding the AD Certificate or Certificate Services role.

*RDP and VNC functions are provided by Yongtao Wang's remote tools. All 5 rdp/vnc tools are supported and auto-detected when present, selecting pro over lite/ad supported. Passing the current credentials (effectively SSO) only functions on Pro and Enterprise versions.
http://www.remotespark.com/android_solution.html
(also available on Android Market)

*TLS Unavailable Error most likely indicates the domain controller isn't capable of LDAP encryption. A connection can usually be made by disabling TLS and SSL in the connection profile. This will allow a non-encrypted connection with the drawback that AD LDAP will not perform password updates without encryption.
To enable LDAP Encrpytion (TLS and SSL):

*Active Directory Certificate Services should be added to one domain controller to provide SSL/TLS security, which is needed to set passwords. In many environments this requirement may already be in place, if not adding a private Enterprise-CA for your organization is a fairly simple process. More information is availiable in our FAQ here:
http://www.activedir.mobi/?page_id=12

*ActiveDir is bound by the Active Directory Security policies that regulate directory security, authentication and object visibility. Valid credentials must be used to gain required access to the AD system, standard (non-admin) user accounts can be used, under normal security permissions standard accounts cannot alter data without being granted Administrator or Special access.
(*)Active Directory and Windows Server are a trademark of Microsoft Corp.

Invisible Protector protect your private applications artfully

Qual’è la miglior serratura di protezione programma? Forte password? Certamente no. La miglior serratura dovrebbe lasciare che gli altri non sentono l'esistenza della serratura per rendere la gente di non avere neanche l’ idea di sbloccarla. Serratura programma II è una serratura di protezione programma di questo tipo.
La serratura invisibile ha fornito un modo di protezione nascosto e di confuzione per proteggere la riservatezza del tuo programma.

Quando il programma sotto protezione in corso di funzionamento gettera' un grave errore che puo' essere considerato come il programma sia in grave BUG ed e' stato chiuso dal sistema, cosi evitare gli altri lo utilizzino e' naturale mentre si puÃ² facilmente revocare lo stato di blocco in vari modi nascosti.
*** Nota ***

La serratura invisibile e’la versione Widget della “Serratura programma II”, dopo l'installazione di questo programma, non si visualizza nessuna icona sul pannello cellulare, molte persone non la trovano. Gli utenti devono fare clic a lungo tempo nella zona bianca di schermata Home e scegliere“Z_AL II”nel menu di "Widget", e poi attraverso fare clic questa icona per avviare il programma di gestione. Dopo completata l’impostazione, puoi rimuovere questa icona dal desktop per mantenerla nascosta.
# English Introduction
What's the best app protector? Strong password? Of course NOT. The best proector would let prier not be aware of any protection. App Locker II is one such protector to protect your private apps.

When launching a protected app, it will throw a fake crash error which may mislead guest user into thinking that your app has a glitch or something. So it can stop guest from using your protected app in a natural manner.
But owner can clear it through several secret ways. It also provide a password protector with a secret input method.
*** NOTE ***
This is a widget version of App Locker II, it will not show any app icon in the app launcher board, so it will be hard to found by guest user.

For owner, please long press the empty area of Home screen, and select the 'Z_AL II' widget from the 'Widget' menu. Then you can click the widget icon to open the App Locker and manage your portected apps. You would better remove the icon from Home screen after you finish the management.
* If you prefer the normal visible version, please try my another app 'App Locker II'.

Registro Orari è un programma indirizzato a chi svolge interventi orari presso clienti o presso la propria sede . Non si tratta di una bollatrice ma di un prodotto decisamente più professionale .

Tale applicativo ha la funzione di tenere memoria di questi interventi per renderli consultabili in qualunque momento da parte dell’ utente finale generando report , mail con rapportini , file CSV per importazione in fogli di calcolo .

E’ possibile applicare diversi listini ognuno slegato dall’ altro ( avete una fascia di clienti i cui interventi sono scontati del 5% ed un altra con i listini rincarati del 3 % ? Questo programma gestisce la cosa senza problemi ) e poi associarli ad uno o più clienti .

E’ possibile caricare un anagrafica dei clienti sul momento o in precedenza in modo da avere sempre sottomano tutti i dati necessari . In questa fase verrà anche associato il listino al singolo cliente .
In fase di caricamento dell’ intervento sarà possibile indicare in cosa l’ intervento e consistito e , chiaramente , le ore di inizio e di fine .
E' inoltre presente una funzione di backup del database per proteggere i dati inseriti .
Funzioni Principali
- Rinnovato aspetto grafico
- Gestione Listini Multipli
- Gestione Anagrafica Clienti
- Inserimento Nuovo intervento ( Autocomplilante )
- Chiusura Intervento Aperto
- Report Selezionato per data
- Report Selezionato per Cliente
- Invio Mail a Cliente con Rapporto dell' intervento (solo per versione Completa)
- Invio Mail generica con Rapporto dell' intervento (solo per versione Completa)
- Esportazione in CSV (solo per versione Completa)
- Backup database (solo per versione Completa)
- Grafici di rendimento
Registro Orari non è un applicazione dotata di effetti speciali , grafica mozzafiato o lustrini .

E' un applicazione che permette di inserire rapidamente dei dati e di effettuare interrogazioni sui dati inseriti altrettanto rapidamente . Per questo e per risparmiare sull' hardware dei dispositivi su cui funzionerà ( e' stata testata in emulazione da Android 2.0 in poi e per schermi da 240 dpi in su ) ho scelto di prediligere un' impostazione basilare dell' interfaccia grafica .
NOTA BENE : QUESTO PROGRAMMA NECESSITA DI UN DISPOSITIVO DOTATO DI SCHEDA DI MEMORIA ( Nel caso di dispositivi con spazio di memorizzazione integrato es. Galaxy Tab questo non sarà necessario ) .
Trovate una presentazione completa del prodotto e delle sue funzioni/Caratteristiche su :
http://mmsoft.info/?page_id=341

Access USPS.com’s most popular tools on-the-go.

Get instant, on-the-go access to USPS.com’s most popular tools with USPS Mobile. Find Post Offices™ and collection boxes nearby, look up ZIP Codes™, calculate postage prices, schedule next-day pickups, request Hold Mail Service, and track packages anywhere you go.

Find USPS Locations when you need to get to a Post Office, Automated Postal Center, or collection box. You’ll get the closest options and even see your results on a map to get driving, walking, or transit directions. Or search for locations anywhere in the country.
Look up a ZIP Code™ for your current location. Or get the ZIP Code for any U.S. address.
Calculate a Price to determine how much postage you need for your letter, card, envelope, or package. Choose from retail or online pricing, add any extra services you need, and view the total, too.

Use Track & Confirm to track your Express Mail® shipments and check the status of packages sent with other services. You can give your shipment a nickname and save it in the app, so you can easily keep tabs on your items until they’re delivered.
Schedule a next-day Free Package Pickup™ and have your carrier pick up Priority Mail®, Express Mail®, Global Express Guaranteed®, or Merchandise Returns shipments from your home or office.
Request Hold Mail Service while you’re away, and we’ll keep the mail safely at your local Post Office™ until you return.

Fixmo Extend is the perfect companion for mobile workers, road warriors, cafe surfers and anyone who needs to stay connected on the go. No Wi-fi? No problem. Fixmo Extend allows you to tether your laptop to the internet using the existing data connection on your Android.

- Connections are made over a secure line
- Get connected quickly with an elegant user interface

Requirements
- Android (OS 1.6 and greater)
- Windows PC (Windows XP or greater)
- Microsoft .Net Framework (2.0 or greater)
- A micro-USB cable to connect your laptop to your Android

Puntate la fotocamera del vostro telefono verso qualsiasi parola e Worldictionary vi fornisce immediatamente la sua definizione e traduzione. Non c'è bisogno di digitare manualmente le parole o di scattare fotografie. Questa applicazione sarà il vostro strumento di viaggio indispensabile e pronto a darvi traduzioni a portata di mano.
1. La funzione "Visualizza e Traduci" consente di ottenere una traduzione istantanea semplicemente puntando la fotocamera del vostro telefono verso la parola che si desidera cercare.

2. Worldictionary riconosce e traduce 15 lingue, fra cui: cinese tradizionale, cinese semplificato, inglese, giapponese, coreano, francese, tedesco, italiano, spagnolo, portoghese, olandese, svedese, finlandese, danese e norvegese. Non c'è bisogno di digitare alcuna parola per cercarla!

3. Per procedere con la ricerca di parole aggiuntive o sapere di più su l'uso di determinate parole, è possibile prima scattare una foto del testo e quindi scegliere la parola da cercare mettendola a fuoco di volta in volta.
4. In alternativa, è possibile selezionare un'immagine dal vostro telefono per ottenere la traduzione immediata senza digitare le parole.
5. Worldictionary salva automaticamente i risultati di ricerca. È anche possibile costruire il proprio database delle parole per aumentare l'efficienza della traduzione.
6. Fornisce Ricerca via Google / Wikipedia / YouTube
7. Fornisce la traduzione di due parole adiacenti
8. Support Pronunciation
Nota bene: una connessione di rete è necessaria.
ps: free version does not support bookmark function

Existen muchas pruebas de selección de personal en el mundo, pero la mayor parte de ellas pueden ser manipulables. La firma funciona como un test que no se puede falsear. Nuestra firma, modulada a lo largo de los años por nuestras experiencias, es única y espontánea, y es por ello inalterable en su esencia. Es, en definitiva, fiel reflejo de nuestra personalidad.
En países como Francia, Italia, Alemania, Suiza y Estados Unidos, las técnicas grafológicas son utilizadas desde hace años en el mundo de la empresa.

Esta Aplicación deducirá tu personalidad a partir de tu firma. La grafología es una ciencia que lleva con nosotros miles de años, se da como asignatura en muchas de las universidades europeas. Nosotros hemos transformado ese conocimiento en una aplicación que te deducirá tu personalidad, ateniendo en cuenta diversas variables como la presión, el tamaño de la firma, la velocidad, el ángulo, etc...
Después, podrás compartir el resultado en Facebook, Twitter, Google+. enviarla por email enviar...etc...
Etiquetas: Firma, grafología, pintar, escribir, compartir,Facebook, Empresa, Twitter.
Si ves que algo falla o quieres sugerir algo, no dudes en contactarme en :
alfonso@sozpic.com
The AirWatch MDM Agent lets you secure, monitor, manage and support your entire fleet of Android devices deployed across your enterprise, when working in conjunction with the AirWatch Console.

This enterprise-wide solution provides your IT department with a single, integrated view of all mobile devices, allowing you to increase help desk efficiencies, reduce support costs and improve the overall support experience for today’s corporate user.

Web-based, functionally robust and highly scalable, AirWatch also provides unparalleled flexibility by offering three different delivery options for the AirWatch console, ensuring all IT environments have access to AirWatch’s industry-leading functionality:
•Software as a Service (SaaS)
•On-premise installation
•Dedicated software appliance
AirWatch provides today’s enterprise with the following functionality:
•Centralized Over-the-Air Deployments
•Asset Management of all Android Devices
•Over-the-Air Enrollments
•Over-the-Air Configurations Management
•Device Security
•Security by Location, Role and Function
•Policy Enforcement
•Robust GPS Tracking and Mapping
•Device Grouping and Bulk Management
•Intelligent Notification and Reporting
•Help Desk Support Capabilities
AirWatch Simplifies Enterprise Mobility.
Instructions for Activation:
Step 1: Download and install the AirWatch MDM Agent on your device through the Marketplace.
Step 2: Once you load the AirWatch MDM Agent onto your device, point the agent to the URL sent out by your IT admin and activate the agent with an AirWatch-issued activation code and server path.

To receive your activation code and server information, go to the AirWatch website (www.air-watch.com/trial) and register for a free trial. If you are an AirWatch customer, please contact your account executive for assistance.
Step 3: Login to the AirWatch Console to manage your devices.
After you register for the free trial on the AirWatch website, you will receive detailed instructions on the login procedure.
For more information on the AirWatch solution, please call 866.501.7705.

The Accenture MyExpenses application is for Accenture staff that wish to manage their expense recording while on the move.
With MyExpenses you can capture & record expenses as soon as the expenses is incurred.
Expenses can even be recorded when offline (e.g. while on a plane) and then synced with your online expenses when a connection is available.
Other features include:
Support for Tablets (Android Honeycomb or above) and handsets
Simple, intuitive UI
View expense report history
Offline and online use
Expense records created offline can be selectively synced with online report prior to submission
NOTE:- Use of this application requires a valid Accenture Enterprise ID and Password. Anyone can use the application in demo mode.
Explanation of Android Permissions -
Network communication permission is required to connect to Accenture myExpenses Server
Permissions -
Your personal information
Storage
Phone calls
System tools
Are required to read system information only if the application crashes, in other cases these permissions are not used.

If the application crashes the user is prompted whether they would like to send a crash report. Only if the user selects yes are these permissions used to access phone information. This is then sent to a secure server to aid diagnosis of any application problems. Personal information is not captured, phone model type & OS version are captured but not IMEI or any personally identifiable information.

Life moves fast. Don't forget a thing, take notes. With Super Notes it's easy to create, edit and save notes
* Share notes via email
* Your notes can be organized
* Password protection
* SHA-512 password hashing
* AES encryption.
This app is simple but powerful.

Allianz Mobile Banking: Allianz Bank Konto und andere Konten mobil verwalten

Die Allianz Finanzen App, zertifiziert durch den TÜV Saarland, bietet mobile Geldautomatensuche und Börseninformationen. Allianz Bank-Kunden können darüber hinaus die mobile Verwaltung von Bankkonten bei der Allianz Bank und anderen Finanzinstituten nutzen.
Multi Banking:

Im Mittelpunkt der Finanzen Applikation steht die Multibankenfähigkeit, also die mobile Verwaltung von Bankkonten bei der Allianz Bank und anderen Finanzinstituten auf Basis des HBCI PIN/TAN (FinTS) Standards. Damit können Sie Ihre Konten bei der Allianz Bank und von allen Banken einrichten (Voraussetzung: ein für das online Banking mit HBCI bzw. FinTS PIN/TAN freigeschaltetes Konto bei einer Bank oder Sparkasse in Deutschland, alle Allianz Bank Konten sind automatisch für HBCI freigeschaltet). Unterstützt werden dabei (institutsabhängig) Girokonten, Festgeldkonten, Tagesgeldkonten, Sparkonten, Darlehenskonten sowie Depots.
Sicherheit:
Die Finanzen App ist durch den TÜV Saarland als TÜV geprüfte Software zertifiziert.

Alle Bankdaten in der Finanzen App werden auf dem Gerät mit Ihrem persönlichen Kennwort geschützt und sind verschlüsselt gespeichert. Die HBCI Datenübertragung Ihrer Bankaufträge erfolgt ebenfalls verschlüsselt.

Durch die Verbindung mit Ihrem Allianz Bank Online Banking Zugang gewährleisten wir maximale Sicherheit und Kontrolle. Bei Verlust des Gerätes können Sie über das Allianz Bank Online Banking so per Fernzugriff alle Kontodaten auf Ihrem Gerät löschen..
Online Registrierung:

Die Multi Banking Funktion steht allen Allianz Bank Online-Kunden für die mobile Verwaltung Ihrer Bankkonten zur Verfügung. Allianz Bank Online-Kunden schalten die Multi Banking Funktion einfach über den Login im Online-Banking unter
https://banking.allianz.de/wps/portal/tw/banking.allianz.de/login.html

mit ihrer Allianz Banking-Zugangsnummer und ihrer PIN frei. Alle Allianz Bank-Kunden, die noch nicht über einen Online- Zugang verfügen, können diesen ganz einfach telefonisch unter Tel. 01802.100 130 bei der Allianz beantragen.
Was die App leistet
Multi Banking
+ Multibanken-Verwaltung Ihrer Bankkonten bei der Allianz Bank und anderen Finanzinstituten (Voraussetzung: Freischaltung für Online Banking mit HBCI PIN/TAN bzw. FinTS PIN/TAN)
+ Sehen Sie Ihre Kontosalden- und -umsätze von unterwegs aus jederzeit ein
+ Führen Sie Ihre Überweisungen jederzeit mobil aus
+ Verwalten Sie Ihre Terminüberweisungen
+ Einfache Einrichtung Ihrer Bankkonten
+ Sicherheit garantiert: Ihre Kontodaten werden verschlüsselt gespeichert und sicher an die Banken übertragen
Geldautomatensuche
+ Suche nach dem nächstgelegenen von 30.000 Geldautomaten in Deutschland
+ Finden Sie den direkten Weg zum nächsten Geldautomaten
+ Für Allianz Bank Kunden sind kostenfreie Geldautomaten gesondert gekennzeichnet
Börseninformationen
+ Informationen über die aktuelle Börsenentwicklung
+ Anzeige von Detailinformationen zu ausgewählten Börsenwerten
Allianz Fachmannsuche
+ Nehmen Sie jederzeit Kontakt zu Ihrem persönlichen Allianz Vertreter auf und suchen Sie nach dem nächsten von über 10 000 Allianz Vertretern in Deutschland
Allianz Bank Informationen
+ Alle wichtigen Servicetelefonnummern der Allianz Bank auf einen Blick
+ Bleiben Sie über die neuesten Angebote der Allianz Bank auf dem Laufenden
+ Direkter E-Mail Kontakt zur Allianz Bank
Ihre Verbesserungsvorschläge
Ihre Meinung ist uns wichtig, damit wir die App stetig weiterentwickeln können. Haben Sie Anregungen? Schreiben Sie uns an [
appsupport@allianz.de
Hinweise zu Berechtigungen:
Diese App kann auf folgendes zugreifen:
1) Für die Geldautomatensuche und die Allianz Fachmannsuche:
UNGEFÄHRER (NETZWERKBASIERTER) STANDORT, GENAUER (GPS-)STANDORT
2) Für die Börseninformationen etc.
UNEINGESCHRÄNKTER INTERNETZUGRIFF
3) Für die Online Registrierung
TELEFONSTATUS LESEN UND IDENTIFIZIEREN
4) Für die Prüfung „Telefon oder Tablet“
NETZWERKSTATUS ANZEIGEN

Il generatore di sistema di lotteria. Combo pieno Spread Un sistema per lotterie un 'pick 6'. Migliorare le vostre probabilità della lotteria, giocando sistematicamente! Scegli il tuo preferito 8 numeri per visualizzare tutte le combinazioni di 6 in quella 8. ---------------------- 8 numeri: 28 biglietti ('Pick 6' gioco della lotteria) --------------- ------- 1.Pick un totale di 8 numeri. 2.Cliccare quei numeri. (Essi sono aggiunti alla lista in fondo) 3.Fare clic sul pulsante 'Genera'. 4.Fill fuori 28 biglietti della lotteria con i 28 gruppi di 6. (In base alla scelta 8 numeri) Questo sistema aumenta la diffusione di numeri. --------------------- Garanzia 100% di matematica: se si 'punteggio' 3 su 8 numeri, si vince un minimo di 10 x 3 / 6 Premio, basato su questo sistema di permutazione. Se ottenete 6 in quella 8, hai vinto il jackpot! Nota: Questo è il premio minimo, tuttavia aumenta drasticamente le probabilità sui premi più grandi. ---------------------

IPsec VPN client for high secure remote access to corporate resources.
NCP Secure Client - Preview on Android (this version will expire on 30 June 2012)
APPLICATION DESCRIPTION:
NCP Secure Client is a universal IPsec VPN client which is compatible to all major IPsec VPN gateways (e.g. NCP, CISCO, Juniper/NetScreen ScreenOS, Microsoft Server 2008 R2, Check Point, SonicWall).

It provides reliable and encrypted network VPN connectivity from Android based devices, and ensures continuous corporate VPN access for users on the go. Whether providing VPN access to a virtual desktop session, business email, or most other Android applications, NCP Secure Client enables business-critical application connectivity.
FAQ
For Frequently Asked Questions please visit our Developer Webpage Link.
FEATURES:
- IKEv1 (Main mode, Aggressive mode), IKEv2 support
- IP address assignment via local IP address or IKE config. mode
- XAUTH
- Split / full tunneling network access
- Pre-shared key or PKCS#12 certificate support
COMPATIBLE DEVICES:
This release supports Android 4.0 (and later) devices.
COMPANY PROFILE:

NCP Engineering GmbH is a manufacturer of software solutions for high-security company communication over public networks and the Internet. NCP’s core competencies lie in the areas of remote access, IP routing, VPN and firewall technologies, identity and access management (IAM), network access control (NAC) as well as strong authentication and integration of PKI infrastructures.

Simple operation, central management, compatibility and efficiency are essential qualities of the NCP solution. Integration into existing IT infrastructures that use a variety of client platforms can be undertaken without problems. Globally operational organizations rely extensively on NCP products, using them to interconnect all their information exchanges via the Internet.
FEEDBACK:

While we are unable to guarantee compatibility for all devices, we look forward to your feedback in connection with any problems you may encounter. You can provide us with feedback by sending us an email to:
